mapper.select: SELECT /* DividendMapper.allocationDetail */ A.NO ,NVL(B.STCNM, A.STOCK_NAME) AS STOCK_NAME ,TO_CHAR(A.TRNSCDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS TRNSCDATE ,A.AMOUNT ,A.DIVIDEND FROM TRANSACTION A LEFT JOIN STOCKINFORMATION B ON ( A.TIKER = B.TIKER AND B.USEYN = 'Y' AND B.DELYN = 'N') WHERE (A.STOCK_NAME = #{stockName} OR B.STCNM = #{stockName}) AND A.TRNSCDATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{trnscdate}, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AND LAST_DAY(TO_DATE(#{trnscdate}, 'yyyy-MM-dd'))
